Text:

Good show anyway

Thanx dude

Yes, I know. I just recorded Junkyard Wars (US) - 4x04 - Collapsible Cars & it pales in comparison to Scrapheap Challenge - 06x03 - Backpack Cars, of which I haven't uploaded or made a torrent of yet.

I'm waiting until there is sufficient seeding of seasons 1 - 5 before I start uploading seasons 6 - 10.
